newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post page one - Sept 26.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post page one - Sept 26.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on Sept. 26:
WASHINGTON - British Airways PLC has no intention of divesting its holdings in USAir Inc., chief executive Robert Ayling said.
WASHINGTON - New U.S. Treasury notes available in January offer protection from inflation.
WASHINGTON - Two area companies selling shares to the public for the first time, Snyder Communications Inc. and LCC International Inc., get a warm reception on Wall Street.
WASHINGTON - The global economy had shaken off weaknesses in Western Europe and was expected to achieve healthy growth through next year, the IMF said.
WASHINGTON - A Dutch holding company has agreed to buy Washington D.C.'s L'Enfant Plaza complex from the British pension fund that has owned it for the past 15 years.
